name: Quiz Room
description:
Welcome to the Quiz Room! Survive round after round of trivia questions, with topics ranging from Captain Crunch’s first name all the way to Minecraft armor durability. But beware, take too long or answer incorrectly and the deadly saw blades will start to spin >:D 

Come and test your knowledge of video games, pop culture, and all the other stuff you learned in your mom’s basement with the Quiz Room.

Features:

  • 150+ trivia questions (Some of them are actually good!)
  • Question difficulties ranging from “baby” to “are you serious”
  • Controls that work 75% of the time
  • Cute green bean sprite with 5 equally dumb unlockable costumes
  • *Feature missing*
  • Stinko music
  • Deliberate pandering to Devolver Digital by referencing games they’ve published

Tips and Tricks:

  • Move with WASD or ↑←↓→
  • Answer questions correctly to make a saw blade disappear...
  • ...answer incorrectly and more saw blades will appear!
  • Unlock new costumes by getting higher scores
  • If you encounter any bugs or typos, please send me hate mail telling me about it

Everything by Gobui

Created for the Disc Room game jam
